mapper.select: select ID,USER_NUM from IAM_USER where USER_NUM = #{userName}
select USER_NO, CARD_UUID from SYS_USER_CARD where CARD_UUID like '%' || #{uuid}

select t2.ID as user_id, t2.FACE_FLAG, t2.USER_NUM as user_name, t2.REALNAME as user_view_name, t5.GROUP_NAME as team_name， t1.LINE_ID, t6.LINENAME as line_name from IAM_USER t2 left join S_USER_EXTEND t1 on t2.USER_NUM = t1.USERID left join DRIVER_GROUP t5 on t5.ID = t1.DRIVERTEAM left join LINE t6 on t6.ID = t1.LINE_ID where t2.USER_NUM = #{userNo}

SELECT t1.id AS positionId,t1.name AS positionName,t1.CODE AS positionCode FROM IAM_POSITION t1 LEFT JOIN IAM_USER_POSITION t2 ON t2.POSITION_ID = t1.ID WHERE t2.USER_ID = #{userId} AND t2.IS_DELETED =0

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM RECORD r WHERE trunc(RE_DATE)=trunc(sysdate) AND RE_USER_ID = #{userId}
AND RE_PERCENT= 1

select e.*,et.EXAMTYPE_NAME AS EXAM_TYPE_NAME from (select exam_id,exam_text,option_a,option_b,option_c,option_d,option_e,option_f,answer_correct,EXAM_TYPE from exam sample(10) where #{rowCount}>rownum) e left join EXAMTYPE et on e.EXAM_TYPE=et.EXAMTYPE_ID

select e.*,et.EXAMTYPE_NAME AS EXAM_TYPE_NAME from (select exam_id,exam_text,option_a,option_b,option_c,option_d,option_e,option_f,answer_correct,EXAM_TYPE from exam sample(10) where #{rowCount}>rownum and EXAM_TYPE=#{typeId}) e left join EXAMTYPE et on e.EXAM_TYPE=et.EXAMTYPE_ID

SELECT t1.EXAMNUM ,t1.EXAMTYPE_ID FROM EXAMCONFIGURELIST t1 LEFT JOIN EXAMCONFIGURE t2 ON t1.EXAMCONFIGURE_ID = t2.ID WHERE t2.ROLE_ID IN (SELECT position_id FROM IAM_USER_POSITION t3 WHERE t3.USER_ID= #{userId})

SELECT t1.ID, t1.CLASS_TYPE, t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID as crId, t2.CROSSINGROAD_NAME as crName, t2.CROSSINGROADTYPE_ID as CROSSING_ROAD_TYPE_ID, t9.CRT_NAME as CROSSING_ROAD_TYPE_NAME, t1.ARRANGE_DATE as recDate, t2.ATTEND_TIME as attentime, t2.QUIT_TIME as offtime, t2.START_RUN_CROSSINGROAD , t2.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE_ID as tableinfo_id, (case when t2.KILOMETRES is null then '0' else t2.KILOMETRES end) as miles, (case when t2.MAN_HOUR is null then '0' else t2.MAN_HOUR end) as whours, t4.ID AS table_id, t4.TIME_TABLE_NAME AS table_name, t5.id AS line_id, t5.linename AS line_name， t7.STATION_NAME as attenplace FROM NEW_SCHEDULING t1 LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD t2 ON t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CLASS_TABLE t8 on t1.NEW_CLASS_TABLE_ID = t8.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE t3 ON t2.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE_ID = t3.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_TIME_TABLE t4 ON t4.ID = t3.NEW_TIME_TABLE_ID LEFT JOIN LINE t5 ON t5.ID = t4.LINE_ID LEFT JOIN STATIONS t7 on t7.ID = t2.ATTEND_LOCATION LEFT JOIN CROSSINGROADTYPE t9 on t9.ID=t2.CROSSINGROADTYPE_ID and t9.IS_DELETED=0 WHERE trunc(t1.ARRANGE_DATE)=trunc(sysdate) AND t1.is_deleted=0 and t8.AUDIT_STATUS = 2 AND (t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID=#{userId} OR t1.ASSISTANT_DRIVER_ID=#{userId} OR t1.STUDENT_DRIVER_ID=#{userId})

SELECT t1.ID, t1.CLASS_TYPE, t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID as crId, t2.CROSSINGROAD_NAME as crName, t2.CROSSINGROADTYPE_ID as CROSSING_ROAD_TYPE_ID, t9.CRT_NAME as CROSSING_ROAD_TYPE_NAME, t1.ARRANGE_DATE as recDate, t2.ATTEND_TIME as attentime, t2.QUIT_TIME as offtime, t2.START_RUN_CROSSINGROAD , t2.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE_ID as tableinfo_id, t2.KILOMETRES as miles, t2.MAN_HOUR as whours, t4.TIME_TABLE_NAME AS table_name, t5.id AS line_id, t5.linename AS line_name, t7.STATION_NAME as attenplace FROM NEW_SCHEDULING t1 LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD t2 ON t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CLASS_TABLE t8 on t1.NEW_CLASS_TABLE_ID = t8.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE t3 ON t2.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE_ID = t3.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_TIME_TABLE t4 ON t4.ID = t3.NEW_TIME_TABLE_ID LEFT JOIN LINE t5 ON t5.ID = t4.LINE_ID LEFT JOIN STATIONS t7 on t7.ID = t2.ATTEND_LOCATION LEFT JOIN CROSSINGROADTYPE t9 on t9.ID=t2.CROSSINGROADTYPE_ID and t9.IS_DELETED=0 WHERE trunc(t1.ARRANGE_DATE)=trunc(sysdate + #{i}) AND t1.is_deleted=0 and t8.AUDIT_STATUS = 2 AND (t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID=#{userId} OR t1.ASSISTANT_DRIVER_ID=#{userId} OR t1.STUDENT_DRIVER_ID=#{userId}) ORDER BY t1.ARRANGE_DATE ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT t4.REALNAME FROM NEW_SCHEDULING t1 LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD t2 ON t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CLASS_TABLE t8 on t1.NEW_CLASS_TABLE_ID = t8.ID LEFT JOIN CROSSINGROADTYPE t3 on t3.ID=t2.CROSSINGROADTYPE_ID and t3.IS_DELETED=0 LEFT JOIN IAM_USER t4 ON t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID = t4.ID and t4.IS_DELETED=0 WHERE t1.CLASS_TYPE=#{classType} and t3.CRT_NAME LIKE '%司机长%' AND t1.is_deleted=0 AND t8.AUDIT_STATUS=2 and trunc(t1.ARRANGE_DATE)=trunc(sysdate) and rownum=1
SELECT ID, WORK_TYPE, ACTION_TIME, KEY_CABINET_NAME FROM NEW_DRIVER_ATTEND_QUIT WHERE DRIVER_ID=#{userId} and WORK_TYPE=2 and rownum=1 order by ACTION_TIME desc

SELECT t1.ID, t1.TRAIN_NAME FROM NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER t1 LEFT JOIN NEW_TIME_TABLE_ARRANGE t2 ON t2.NEW_TIME_TABLE_ID=t1.NEW_TIME_TABLE_ID AND t2.IS_DELETED=0 LEFT JOIN NEW_TIME_TABLE t3 ON t3.ID=t2.NEW_TIME_TABLE_ID AND t3.IS_DELETED=0 WHERE trunc(t2.ARRANGE_DATE)=trunc(sysdate) AND t3.LINE_ID=#{lineId} and t1.IS_DELETED=0

select t2.ID, t2.STATION_NAME, t2.STATION_CODE, t2.LINE_ID from NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_STATION t1 LEFT JOIN STATIONS t2 on t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID = t2.ID where t2.LINE_ID=#{lineId} and t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID=#{trainId} order by t2.ID ASC

SELECT t1.ID,t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID AS TRAIN_ID,t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID as STATION_ID, t1.IN_TIME AS arrive,t1.OUT_TIME AS depart,t2.STATION_NAME,t3.TRAIN_NAME FROM NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_STATION t1 LEFT JOIN STATIONS t2 on t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER t3 on t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID = t3.ID where t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID=#{trainId} AND t1.IS_DELETED = 0 and t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID=#{stationId}

select.foreach: select t.* from (select t1.ID,t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID AS TRAIN_ID,t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID as STATION_ID,t1.IN_TIME AS arrive, t1.OUT_TIME AS depart,t2.STATION_NAME,t3.TRAIN_NAME,1 AS station_type from NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_STATION t1 LEFT JOIN STATIONS t2 on t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER t3 on t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID = t3.ID where t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID=#{req.train} AND t1.IS_DELETED = 0 and t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID=#{req.stationStart} UNION select t1.ID,t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID AS TRAIN_ID,t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID as STATION_ID,t1.IN_TIME AS arrive, t1.OUT_TIME AS depart,t2.STATION_NAME,t3.TRAIN_NAME,2 AS station_type from NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_STATION t1 LEFT JOIN STATIONS t2 on t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER t3 on t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID = t3.ID where t1.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID=#{req.train} AND t1.IS_DELETED = 0 and t1.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID=#{req.stationEnd}) t

mapper.select: select t1.ID as train_id,t1.TRAIN_NAME as train_num,t2.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID as station_id,t3.STATION_NAME from NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER t1 left join NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_STATION t2 on t1.ID =t2.NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER_ID left join STATIONS t3 on t2.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID = t3.ID where t2.CURRENT_STATIONS_ID is not null and t1.TRAIN_NAME = #{trainNum} ORDER by t1.id ,t2.OUT_TIME asc
SELECT * FROM SYS_USER_FACE
mapper.insert:
insert into NEW_DRIVER_ATTEND_QUIT ( ID, WORK_TYPE, ACTION_TIME, NEW_SCHEDULING_ID, "alcohol_check_status", "alcohol_check_result",
KEY_CABINET_NAME,
CLOCK_IN_USER, DRIVER_ID, CREATE_BY ) values ( #{id}, #{workType}, to_date(#{actionTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{newSchedulingId}, #{alcoholTestStatus}, #{alcoholResult},
#{keyCabinet},
#{userId}, #{userId}, #{userId} )

insert into NEW_DRIVER_ATTEND_QUIT ( ID, WORK_TYPE, ACTION_TIME, NEW_SCHEDULING_ID,
KEY_CABINET_NAME,
CLOCK_IN_USER, DRIVER_ID, CREATE_BY ) values ( #{id}, #{workType}, to_date(#{actionTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{newSchedulingId},
#{keyCabinet},
#{userId}, #{userId}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DRIVER_REPORT WHERE "TIME"=to_date(#{date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and job_number=#{driverId} and IS_DELETED=0
mapper.insert:
insert into DRIVER_REPORT (id,
"TIME",
LINE_TYPE,
name,
job_number,
join_time,
end_time,
kilometers,
work_hours,
SCHEDULE,
SCHEDULING_ID,
create_by,create_time) values (#{id},
to_date(#{date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{lineType},
#{userId},
#{driverId},
to_date(#{attendTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{offTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{kilometer},
#{workHour},
#{tableId},
#{schedule},
#{driverId}, sysdate)

INSERT ALL
into SYS_USER_FACE ( ID, USER_NO, FACE_FEATURE ) values ( sys_guid(), #{userNo}, #{item} )
select * from dual
mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID, t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID, u1.REALNAME AS DRIVER_NAME, (CASE WHEN t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN q1.ACTION_TIME IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN TO_CHAR(q1.ACTION_TIME,'HH24MISS')>t2.ATTEND_TIME THEN 2 ELSE 1 end) DRIVER_FLAG, t1.ASSISTANT_DRIVER_ID, u2.REALNAME AS ASSISTANT_DRIVER_NAME, (CASE WHEN t1.ASSISTANT_DRIVER_ID IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN q2.ACTION_TIME IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN TO_CHAR(q2.ACTION_TIME,'HH24MISS')>t2.ATTEND_TIME THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) ASSISTANT_DRIVER_FLAG, t1.STUDENT_DRIVER_ID, u3.REALNAME AS STUDENT_DRIVER_NAME, (CASE WHEN t1.STUDENT_DRIVER_ID IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN q3.ACTION_TIME IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN TO_CHAR(q3.ACTION_TIME,'HH24MISS')>t2.ATTEND_TIME THEN 2 ELSE 1 END) STUDENT_DRIVER_FLAG, t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID as crId, t2.CROSSINGROAD_NAME as crName, t2.ATTEND_TIME as attentime, t2.QUIT_TIME as offtime, t5.id AS line_id, t5.linename AS line_name， t7.STATION_NAME as attenplace, tn.TRAIN_NAME, tn.TRAIN_NUMBER_TYPE FROM NEW_SCHEDULING t1 LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD t2 ON t1.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_ID = t2.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CLASS_TABLE t8 on t1.NEW_CLASS_TABLE_ID = t8.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE t3 ON t2.NEW_CROSSINGROAD_TABLE_ID = t3.ID LEFT JOIN NEW_TIME_TABLE t4 ON t4.ID = t3.NEW_TIME_TABLE_ID and t4.IS_DELETED=0 LEFT JOIN LINE t5 ON t5.ID = t4.LINE_ID LEFT JOIN STATIONS t7 on t7.ID = t2.ATTEND_LOCATION LEFT JOIN CROSSINGROADTYPE t9 on t9.ID=t2.CROSSINGROADTYPE_ID and t9.IS_DELETED=0 LEFT JOIN NEW_DRIVER_ATTEND_QUIT q1 on t1.ID=q1.NEW_SCHEDULING_ID and q1.CLOCK_IN_USER=t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID and q1.WORK_TYPE=1 and ROWNUM=1 LEFT JOIN NEW_DRIVER_ATTEND_QUIT q2 on t1.ID=q2.NEW_SCHEDULING_ID and q2.CLOCK_IN_USER=t1.ASSISTANT_DRIVER_ID and q2.WORK_TYPE=1 and ROWNUM=1 LEFT JOIN NEW_DRIVER_ATTEND_QUIT q3 on t1.ID=q3.NEW_SCHEDULING_ID and q3.CLOCK_IN_USER=t1.STUDENT_DRIVER_ID and q3.WORK_TYPE=1 and ROWNUM=1 LEFT JOIN NEW_TRAIN_NUMBER tn on tn.ID=t2.ATTEND_TRAIN_NUMBER LEFT JOIN IAM_USER u1 ON u1.ID=t1.NEW_DRIVER_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN IAM_USER u2 ON u2.ID=t1.ASSISTANT_DRIVER_ID LEFT JOIN IAM_USER u3 ON u3.ID=t1.STUDENT_DRIVER_ID WHERE trunc(t1.ARRANGE_DATE)=trunc(sysdate) AND t1.is_deleted=0 and t8.AUDIT_STATUS=2 and t2.CLASS_TYPE=#{classType} AND t4.LINE_ID is not null ORDER BY t2.ORDER_NO ASC
